title: oru nAzhi
sahitya:
oru nAzhi vAzhveninum uyar vAzhvadE peridu oru nUru ANDeninum shiru vAzhvadE izhivu


anupallavi

  oru nALil maraindu viDum udir pUvin vAzhvinidu perunAn vaLarndirukkum pEikkarumbil payanEdu


caraNam    shruti shErum oru paNNil sukahm shErumallAl toLaiyAgha shevi pAyum dhvaniyenrum irundenna 
padinAru vayaduDaiya bAlakanE inrumuLan payanillA nUTrANDil pazhi pAvam viLaindirukkum
